txt.en: 'Thank you, [placeholder]. We shall put these to good use.'

'There is an abandoned Corsair camp to the north of Tadrent -- Makham Mijann, it was called. We tried to dismantle the camp to reuse materials, but efforts have halted for the time being.\n\n'If you venture there, could you collect as many pieces of wood and cloth as you can? There ought to be wood piles and untouched Corsair banners that we left behind.'
You have collected a suitable amount of wood and cloth.\n\nYou should give these materials to Bruidis in Tadrent.
The structures at the former Corsair camp contain plenty of useful materials.
Bruidis has asked you to collect wood and cloth from wood piles and banners in Makham Mijann.\n\nMakham Mijann lies north of Tadrent.
